options.live: You dodge to the left, closer to the growing hole. You turn back to see a short corridor has appeared with three doors at the end of it. Unfortunately, there's also a skeleton in the way.
options.die: You dodge to the side, but the skeleton was just a little faster than you were. You hardly have the chance to look up as everything fades to black.

options.live: You charge the skeleton, and it misses its attack!
options.die: The skeleton impales you with its sword. Your attempts to struggle only accelerate your demise.

options.option_text: Attempt to skirt around the left of skeleton
options.live: You feel the sword displace the air as it whizzes past you. Now what?
options.die: You're just a tad too slow. The skeleton slashes your head clean off. You feel the blood pour out of your neck as everything slowly fades to black.
